snippet: Mahinda Rajapaksa impeached Chief Justice Shirani Bandaranayake in a process that religious leaders and pro-democracy activists view as a power grab by the president.
abstract: Sri Lankan President Mahinda Rajapaksa impeaches Chief Justice Shirani Bandaranayake in culmination of widely criticized process that has crippled nation's courts and may start constitutional crisis; religious leaders and pro-democracy activists view move as power grab by Rajapaksa.
lead_paragraph: Mahinda Rajapaksa impeached Chief Justice Shirani Bandaranayake in a process that religious leaders and pro-democracy activists view as a power grab by the president.

headline.seo: President of Sri Lanka Dismisses Chief Justice
headline.main: President of Sri Lanka Dismisses Chief Justice
headline.print_headline: President Of Sri Lanka Dismisses Chief Justice
